00040 void RangeServerClient::load_range(struct sockaddr_in &addr, TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log, RangeState &range_state, uint16_t flags, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00041   CommBufPtr cbufPtr( RangeServerProtocol::create_request_load_range(table, range, transfer_log, range_state, flags) );
00042   send_message(addr, cbufPtr, handler);
00043 }
00044 
00045 void RangeServerClient::load_range(struct sockaddr_in &addr, TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log, RangeState &range_state, uint16_t flags) {
00046   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00047   EventPtr event_ptr;
00048   CommBufPtr cbufPtr( RangeServerProtocol::create_request_load_range(table, range, transfer_log, range_state, flags) );
00049   send_message(addr, cbufPtr, &syncHandler);
00050   if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00051     throw Exception((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00052                     std::string("RangeServer load_range() failure : ") + Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr));
00053 }

00080 void RangeServerClient::create_scanner(struct sockaddr_in &addr, TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range, ScanSpec &scan_spec, ScanBlock &scan_block) {
00081   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00082   EventPtr event_ptr;
00083   CommBufPtr cbufPtr( RangeServerProtocol::create_request_create_scanner(table, range, scan_spec) );
00084   send_message(addr, cbufPtr, &syncHandler);
00085   if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00086     throw Exception((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00087                     std::string("RangeServer create_scanner() failure : ") + Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr));
00088   else {
00089     HT_EXPECT(scan_block.load(event_ptr) == Error::OK, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00090   }
00091 }

00203 
00207 void RangeServerClient::send_message(struct sockaddr_in &addr, CommBufPtr &cbufPtr, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00208   int error;
00209   time_t timeout = (m_timeout == 0) ? m_default_timeout : m_timeout;
00210 
00211   m_timeout = 0;
00212   if ((error = m_comm->send_request(addr, timeout, cbufPtr, handler)) != Error::OK) {
00213     HT_WARNF("Comm::send_request to %s:%d failed - %s",
00214                 inet_ntoa(addr.sin_addr), ntohs(addr.sin_port), Error::get_text(error));
00215     throw Exception(error, std::string("Comm::send_request to ") + inet_ntoa(addr.sin_addr) + ":" + ntohs(addr.sin_port) + " failed");
00216   }
00217 }
